answers.answer: Make sure your drinking plenty of water. I would also go to the doc and make sure your not getting gestational diabetes. I have only had one moment of getting hot and sweaty, got light headed and made it to my bed in time to recover, but never blacked out or passed out.

Do you get super light headed and see spots? It's normal in the beginning, kind of, but it might also be high blood sugar, have you had your glucose test yet?  It's something you definitely need to tell your Dr
You definitely need to call your doctor and tell him. It could be your blood sugar

Early on if i bent over too much like to make the bed or pick something up id get light headed and sometimes see spots but i never passed out just because i was standing up :/ i think its time to give your dr a call

Happened to me a few times, though i managed to sit or lie down before blackout. Along with the above suggestions it could also be low blood sugar or low iron. I had a combination of both each time i felt that way.
What is ur blood pressure like when it happens? If its only when u stand, could be orthostatic hypotension. I would call ur doc and let them know
Thanks,ladies yall were right it was my blood sugar

I have the same thing I have passed out in stores and everytime I go shopping I start to pass out even if I've just ate. I'm 21 weeks and still struggle with it the best thing you can do is not be on your feet for long periods of time and to keep oj on you everytime you go somewhere

question: Since I've been pregnant i start to black out. I will pass out if im standing but the only time i dont pass out is if im sitting down of course. Do any of y'all have this problem or known anyone that has.
title: does anybody have this problem
